mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_board ( TITLE, CONTENTS, WRITER, HIT_CNT, DEL_GB, THUMBNAIL, LIKE_CNT ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{contents}, #{writer}, 0, 'N', #{thumbnail}, 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT B_ID, TITLE, WRITER, HIT_CNT, (date_format(CREA_DTM, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i')) AS CREA_DTM, THUMBNAIL, LIKE_CNT FROM tb_board WHERE DEL_GB = 'N' ORDER BY B_ID DESC
SELECT B_ID, TITLE, WRITER, HIT_CNT, (date_format(CREA_DTM, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i')) AS CREA_DTM, THUMBNAIL, LIKE_CNT FROM tb_board WHERE DEL_GB = 'N' ORDER BY LIKE_CNT DESC LIMIT 3
